resourceTemplates.name: threat-indicators-by-type
resourceTemplates.title: Threat indicators by type
resourceTemplates.description: Lists threat indicators by type with minimal metadata.

resourceTemplates.name: alerts-v2-list
resourceTemplates.title: List alerts (v2) with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Generic OData filter (e.g., severity eq 'high' and createdDateTime ge 2025-08-01T00:00:00Z). If no filter, pass 1 eq 1. Combine $filter terms as needed.

resourceTemplates.name: alert-v2-details
resourceTemplates.title: Alert details (v2, v1.0)
resourceTemplates.description: Fetch a specific alert_v2 by id.

resourceTemplates.name: incidents-list
resourceTemplates.title: List incidents with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Use OData filter (e.g., status eq 'active'). If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.

resourceTemplates.name: incident-details
resourceTemplates.title: Incident details
resourceTemplates.description: Fetch a specific incident by id.

resourceTemplates.name: signins-list
resourceTemplates.title: List sign-ins with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Recommended to include a time window in $filter. Example: createdDateTime ge 2025-08-17T00:00:00Z and conditionalAccessStatus eq 'failure'. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.

resourceTemplates.name: directory-audits-list
resourceTemplates.title: List directory audit events with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Example filters: activityDateTime ge <UTC> or initiatedBy/user/id eq '<objectId>'. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.

resourceTemplates.name: provisioning-events-list
resourceTemplates.title: List provisioning events with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Example filters: activityDateTime ge <UTC>, statusInfo/status eq 'failure'. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.

resourceTemplates.name: risky-users-list
resourceTemplates.title: List risky users with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Example filter: riskLevel eq 'high'. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.

resourceTemplates.name: risk-detections-list
resourceTemplates.title: List risk detections with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Example filter: detectedDateTime ge <UTC> and riskLevel eq 'high'. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.

resourceTemplates.name: user-registration-details-list
resourceTemplates.title: List user registration details with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Example filter: isMfaRegistered eq true. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.

resourceTemplates.name: users-registered-by-method
resourceTemplates.title: Users registered by method (function)
resourceTemplates.description: Function parameters required (e.g., 'all','all'). OData $filter is not supported; $top/$skip may be limited.

resourceTemplates.name: secure-scores-list
resourceTemplates.title: List secure scores with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Typical usage is just $top and $select. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1; filtering options are limited on this endpoint.

resourceTemplates.name: secure-score-controls-list
resourceTemplates.title: List secure score control profiles with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Example filter: controlCategory eq 'Identity'. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.

resourceTemplates.name: managed-devices-list
resourceTemplates.title: List managed devices with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Example filter: operatingSystem eq 'Windows'. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.

resourceTemplates.name: device-compliance-policy-details
resourceTemplates.title: Device compliance policy details
resourceTemplates.description: Fetch policy details by id.

resourceTemplates.name: role-assignments-list
resourceTemplates.title: List role assignments with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Example filter: principalId eq '{objectId}' or roleDefinitionId eq '{roleId}'. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.

resourceTemplates.name: pim-role-management-alerts-list
resourceTemplates.title: List PIM role management alerts (beta)
resourceTemplates.description: Common: $filter=scopeId eq '/' and scopeType eq 'DirectoryRole'. $expand=alertDefinition,alertIncidents. Some $expand combinations cannot be used with all $selects.

resourceTemplates.name: attack-simulations-list
resourceTemplates.title: List attack simulations with filter
resourceTemplates.description: Example filter: createdDateTime ge <UTC>. If no filter, pass 1 eq 1.
